definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Yet the dominoes may not fall so fast.
sentences.chinese: 然而這份多米諾骨牌並不會倒地如此之快。

sentences.english: Enemies hit by meteors are knocked down, 25 second recharge.
sentences.chinese: 被隕石雨擊中的敵人將倒地，25秒回覆。

sentences.english: Within minutes of being bitten, Bamboo's Father dropped dead!
sentences.chinese: 被咬後幾分鐘內，竹蛇之父倒地而死。

sentences.english: A shot rings out, blood spatters the man's shirt, and he falls to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一聲槍響後，血跡沾滿了他的襯衣，他應聲倒地。

sentences.english: And immediately he fell down dead.
Group A-push ups, free falls, leg circles and cuts.
sentences.chinese: 組俯臥撐，自由倒地，旋腿與分切。

sentences.english: The Italian prime minister was whisked away in a car after falling to the ground during the attack.
sentences.chinese: 這位意大利總理在遇襲倒地後被轎車帶走了。

sentences.english: See Yu Zhixin shot in the ground, woomi jumped to his rickshaw.
sentences.chinese: 看到餘志鑫中槍倒地，友美跳下黃包車奔向他。

sentences.english: Jay wobbled for a second and then dropped like an anchor.
sentences.chinese: 傑晃了兩晃，像拋出的錨一樣頹然倒地。

sentences.english: Woods fell to the ground at the last gasp by venom dropped into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 嗚茲則被滴進嘴裏的毒液整得倒地不起。

sentences.english: He was on the point of winning when he collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 他即將取勝之際，卻支持不住而倒地。

sentences.english: The drunken man zigzagged down the street.
sentences.chinese: 那個醉漢歪歪倒倒地沿街走去。

sentences.english: Hwang hurried escape and hit the pole lying on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 黃某慌忙逃跑，撞上電線杆倒地。

sentences.english: Tom pulled out his Sidearm and warily moved to the fallen aliens.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆拔出他的手槍，警惕地向倒地的外星人移動。

sentences.english: Look at the injured ground Wu Fangmei, Tian Youmiao stay was stunned.
sentences.chinese: 看着重傷倒地的武芳梅，田有苗呆愣住了。

sentences.english: The young man is then shown writhing on the ground, bleeding heavily and begging for help.
sentences.chinese: 這名年輕男子隨後倒地，流血不止，乞求幫助。

definition: to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
to meet violent death/to get killed
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
